Empath::

"I'm here for reasons similar to those for Cygnar's call."  The femme 
is a bit miffed; she expected she'd be delivering the news of 
Hydras's creation herself.  "You, Rodimus, are the only transformer 
who hates Galvatron - and therefore Hydras - as much as I."  She 
transforms to robot mode, revealing the Decepticon insignias on her 
wings for the first time.  "I offer an alliance to eliminate this 
creature.  I will follow your commands so long as they pertain to the 
destruction of Hydras.  Do we have a deal?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> 
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> Rodimus recieves the message from Cygnar, and opens a return 
channel.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Rodimus here. This is surely an odd turn of events. 
Hydras is a threat so you can count the Maximals in on your assualt 
plans. Keep me informed. Once you have enough troops I suggest we all 
meet to plan.
> 
> Rodimus Prime returns his attention to Empath.
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Now why did you want to meet with me?
